mapper.insert: insert into floor_information (bhf_code, drw_code, floorinfo_floor, floorinfo_rgsde, size_x, size_y) values ( #{bhf_code}, LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{floorinfo_floor}, date(now()), #{size_x}, #{size_y} )
mapper.select: select f.floorinfo_floor, d.drw_flpth from DRAWING d, FLOOR_INFORMATION f where BHF_CODE = #{bhf_code} and f.DRW_CODE = d.DRW_CODE order by FLOORINFO_RGSDE desc

select f.floorinfo_floor, d.drw_flpth, d.drw_code, f.size_x, f.size_y from DRAWING d, FLOOR_INFORMATION f where f.DRW_CODE IN ( select max(drw_code) from floor_information where bhf_code = #{bhf_code} group by floorinfo_floor ) and f.DRW_CODE = d.DRW_CODE order by f.FLOORINFO_RGSDE desc, f.FLOORINFO_FLOOR asc limit #{floor},1
